https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nt9ZUDEXsnOg0sxpA5BFsqoiHfg.jpg Adapted from William Shakespeare's epic tale of honor, ambition, betrayal, hubris, and the supernatural. The story follows the downfall of Rome's most honored citizen, Marcus Brutus, as he conspires to assassinate Julius Caesar, in order to forestall tyranny and preserve democracy. Ambition's Debt
